DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics of ONO-4538 administered to Korean patients with advanced or recurrent solid tumors who are refractory or intolerant to standard therapy or for whom no appropriate treatment is available.
DOC.brief_title: ONO-4538 Phase I Study in Patients With Solid Tumor
